Package controllers

package controllers
The controllers package contains classes that manage the application's control flow. Controllers handle user input, process requests, and coordinate interactions between the user interface and the underlying business logic.

Key responsibilities of classes in this package include routing, handling user actions, and updating the view based on changes in the underlying data models.

This package plays a crucial role in implementing the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture, where controllers act as intermediaries between models and views.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommitteeController
    The CommitteeController class extends the functionality of the StudentController class to provide specific features for Committee Members in the CAMs application.
    DataTransferController
    The DataTransferController class provides methods for importing and exporting data to and from the CAMs application.
    SessionController
    The SessionController class manages user sessions in the CAMs application.
    StaffController
    The StaffController class handles the staff-specific user interface and interactions in the CAMs application.
    StudentController
    The StudentController class handles the student-specific user interface and interactions in the CAMs application.
